title: No Fee, Renovated 2 Br w/ marble bathroom, washer & dryer, and granite
posting_body: ['No Fee, Renovated 2 Br w/ marble bathroom, washer & dryer, and granite kitchen with dishwasher.', 'Listing ID #: 138384', 'Price: $3,495', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Brownstone', 'Subway', 'Roof Deck', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Renovated', 'Marble Bath', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Free Rent', 'Renovated 2 bedroom with marble bathroom, washer & dryer, and granite kitchen with dishwasher.', 'Accented by exposed brick, high ceilings, and hardwood floors.', 'Available for October 1 occupancy.', 'Conveniently located on Lexington Avenue near Central Park with quick access to the uptown and downtown buses and a short walk to the 6 trains.', 'Please call for access.', 'Jason Paulino', 'Phone: (646) 300-2984', 'Mobile: (646) 300-2984', 'Fax: (212) 227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 (646) 300-2984 \xa0 (646) 300-2984 \xa0 FAX (212) 227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Jason Paulino at (646) 300-2984']
